Constituent.Name: Total Dissolved Solids
Constituent.Description: 2000 National SPARROW model of dissolved-solids transport

Source.Name: All
Source.Description: All sources combined.

Source.Name: Carbonate resid, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Carbonate residual material, high yielding.

Source.Name: Carbonate resid, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Carbonate residual material, low yieldings.

Source.Name: Noncarbonate resid, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Noncarbonate residual material, high yielding.

Source.Name: Noncarbonate resid, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Noncarbonate residual material, low yielding.

Source.Name: Alk. intrusive volcanic rock
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Alkaline intrusive volcanic rock.

Source.Name: Silicic residual, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Silicic residual material, high yielding.

Source.Name: Silicic residual, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Silicic residual material, low yielding.

Source.Name: Extrusive volcanic rock
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Extrusive volcanic rock.

Source.Name: Colluvial sediment, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Colluvial sediment, high yielding.

Source.Name: Colluvial sediment, mod
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Colluvial sediment, moderate yielding.

Source.Name: Colluvial sediment, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Colluvial sediment, low yielding.

Source.Name: Glacial till, clayey
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial till, clayey.

Source.Name: Glacial till, loamy, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial till, loamy, high yielding.

Source.Name: Glacial till, loamy, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial till, loamy, low yielding.

Source.Name: Glacial till, coarse, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial till, coarse textured, high yielding.

Source.Name: Glacial till, coarse, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial till, coarse textured, low yielding.

Source.Name: Glacial outwash coarse, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial outwash and glacial lake sediment, coarse textured, high yielding.

Source.Name: Glacial outwash coarse, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial outwash and glacial lakesediment, coarse textured, low yielding.

Source.Name: Glacial lake, fine, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial lake sediment, fine textured, high yielding.

Source.Name: Glacial lake, fine, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Glacial lake sediment, fine textured, low yielding.

Source.Name: Eolian, coarse (sand dunes)
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Eolian sediment, coarse textured (sand dunes).

Source.Name: Eolian, fine (loess), high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), high yielding.

Source.Name: Eolian, fine (loess), mod
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), moderate yielding.

Source.Name: Eolian, fine (loess), non-yld
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), non-yielding.

Source.Name: Saline lake sediment
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Saline lake sediment.

Source.Name: Alluvium/coastal, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Alluvium and fine-textured coastal zone sediment, high yielding.

Source.Name: Alluvium/coastal, low
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Alluvium and fine-textured coastal zone sediment, low yielding.

Source.Name: Coastal zone, coarse, high
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Coastal zone sediment, coarse-textured, high yielding.

Source.Name: Coastal zone, coarse, low/Name> sq km Dissolved solids from Coastal zone sediment, coarse-textured, low-yielding.
Hydric soils, peat and muck
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Hydric soils, peat and muck.

Source.Name: Water (undiff submerged lith)
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from undifferentiated submerged lithologies).

Source.Name: Cultivated land
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Cultivated land.

Source.Name: Pasture land
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Pasture land.

Source.Name: Urban land
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Urban land.

Source.Name: Road de-icers
Source.Description: Dissolved solids from Road de-icers.

Source.Name: Boundary inflow
Source.Description: Dissolved solids entering the the United States through stream fluxes at international boundaries with Canada or Mexico.

Source.Name: Nominal input
Source.Description: A nominal input of 1 kg/yr of dissolved solids to ensure non-zero fluxes in every catchment.

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Carbonate residual material, high yielding Dissolved solids from Carbonate residual material, high yielding. Carbonate residual material, low yielding Dissolved solids from Carbonate residual material, low yielding. Noncarbonate residual material, high yielding Dissolved solids from Noncarbonate residual material, high yielding. Noncarbonate residual material, low yielding Dissolved solids from Noncarbonate residual material, low yielding. Alkaline intrusive volcanic rock Dissolved solids from Alkaline intrusive volcanic rock. Silicic residual material, high yielding Dissolved solids from Silicic residual material, high yielding. Silicic residual material, low yielding Dissolved solids from Silicic residual material, low yielding. Extrusive volcanic rock Dissolved solids from Extrusive volcanic rock. Colluvial sediment, high yielding Dissolved solids from Colluvial sediment, high yielding. Colluvial sediment, moderate yielding Dissolved solids from Colluvial sediment, moderate yielding. Colluvial sediment, low yielding Dissolved solids from Colluvial sediment, low yielding. Glacial till, clayey Dissolved solids from Glacial till, clayey. Glacial till, loamy, high yielding Dissolved solids from Glacial till, loamy, high yielding. Glacial till, loamy, low yielding Dissolved solids from Glacial till, loamy, low yielding. Glacial till, coarse textured, high yielding Dissolved solids from Glacial till, coarse textured, high yielding. Glacial till, coarse textured, low yielding Dissolved solids from Glacial till, coarse textured, low yielding. Glacial outwash and glacial lake sediment, coarse textured, high yielding Dissolved solids from Glacial outwash and glacial lake sediment, coarse textured, high yielding. Glacial outwash and glacial lake sediment, coarse textured, low yielding Dissolved solids from Glacial outwash and glacial lake sediment, coarse textured, low yielding. Glacial lake sediment, fine textured, high yielding Dissolved solids from Glacial lake sediment, fine textured, high yielding. Glacial lake sediment, fine textured, low yielding Dissolved solids from Glacial lake sediment, fine textured, low yielding. Eolian sediment, coarse textured (sand dunes) Dissolved solids from Eolian sediment, coarse textured (sand dunes). Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), high yielding Dissolved solids from Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), high yielding. Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), moderate yielding Dissolved solids from Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), moderate yielding. Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), non-yielding Dissolved solids from Eolian sediment, fine textured (glacial loess), non-yielding. Saline lake sediment Dissolved solids from Saline lake sediment. Alluvium and fine-textured coastal zone sediment, high yielding Dissolved solids from Alluvium and fine-textured coastal zone sediment, high yielding. Alluvium and fine-textured coastal zone sediment, low yielding Dissolved solids from Alluvium and fine-textured coastal zone sediment, low yielding. Coastal zone sediment, coarse-textured, high yielding Dissolved solids from Coastal zone sediment, coarse-textured, high yielding. Coastal zone sediment, coarse-textured, low-yielding Dissolved solids from Coastal zone sediment, coarse-textured, low-yielding. Hydric soils, peat and muck Dissolved solids from Hydric soils, peat and muck. Water (undifferentiated submerged lithologies) Dissolved solids from undifferentiated submerged lithologies). Cultivated land Dissolved solids from Cultivated land. Pasture land Dissolved solids from Pasture land. Urban land Dissolved solids from Urban land. Road de-icers Dissolved solids from Road de-icers. Boundary inflow Dissolved solids entering the the United States through stream fluxes at international boundaries with Canada or Mexico. Nominal input A nominal input of 1 kg/yr of dissolved solids to ensure non-zero fluxes in every catchment.
